General.Name: Ero Copper Corp
General.Description: Ero Copper Corp. engages in the exploration, development, and production of mining projects in Brazil. Its flagship asset includes Caraíba operations that comprise the production and sale of copper concentrates located in northeastern Bahia State, Brazil, as well as gold and silver produced and sold as by-products. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 625 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2T6
